org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.struct

Interface HBaseValueFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroHBaseValueFactory, DefaultHBaseValueFactory, StructHBaseValueFactory

    public interface HBaseValueFactory
    Provides capability to plugin custom implementations for querying of data stored in HBase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
